title: BRIEF-Akoustis Technologies - Expects To Record A Net Loss Of About $4.8 Mln For Three Months Ended March 31
text:
Market News May 10, 2018 / 12:23 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Akoustis Technologies - Expects To Record A Net Loss Of About $4.8 Mln For Three Months Ended March 31 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 10 (Reuters) - Akoustis Technologies Inc:
* AKOUSTIS TECHNOLOGIES - EXPECTS TO RECORD A NET LOSS OF ABOUT $4.8 MILLION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 Source text: ( bit.ly/2wueQby ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
